I think u guys shld just try out. Everyone earns different amount. Its just how much u want to do per day. Some drivers choose jobs  some drivers take any jobs. Some do whole day  some do few hours. No harm just trying it out urself  if you find it not worth it then just stop and take back the deposit.

Hi everyone! New to LLM here. Need some tips and advice from any one of you using cars. I understand that car parking sometimes is very hard. I took an order once from Little India on a Sunday and merchant told me to just park by the road side and collect the food. I felt too paisey to park coz it was a busy street and there wasnt any space in front of the shop to squeeze a car in. It was literally the pavement and then the road. Had to do multiple turns to find a spot. In such a case  how would you go about parking your car?
Like this die die must rent van Liao

Normally yr food will be ready most of the time just park and collect without delay  for shopping mall I wouldnâ€™t even want to accept cos very risky . Honestly little Indra is much more easier then some shopping mall
Yeah. that particular shop  food was ready for collection. but I guess I was too paisey to do that since I once used to think "Why lah these drivers cause convenience and park here"
I never took any malls and especially CBD area orders before. the hassle of finding parking and all.
Most of the time is illegal parking for me but if you collect fast shouldnâ€™t be a problem
I see. So I just have to be thick skin for that 2mins and quickly grab food and chao. Thank you :)
